results.name: Denominators of continued fraction for left factorial.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..895
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n<2, n, a(n-1) - (n\2)*a(n-2) ); \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 05 2019
end if; return a; end function;
[a(n) for n in (0..40)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 05 2019
List([0..40], n-> a(n) ); # _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 05 2019
results.author: Aleksandar Petojevic (apetoje(AT)ptt.yu), Sep 05 2000
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Sep 06 2000
